评论详情: I am obsessed with different necklines. This shirt fit so cute, was actually long enough (i'm 5'8 and have a longer torso) and covered my bust (32DD) without bunching. It is also great quality.

评论概述: So Much Potential, But Missed the Mark
评论详情: I really wanted to love this top—it has such a unique, sexy vibe with the choker neckline and cutout details. But unfortunately, it just didn’t fit right. I sized up to make sure it wasn’t too tight, but the body lost its charm and ended up looking boxy and unflattering. The neckline was as stunning as I hoped, but the overall fit just didn’t do it for me. It’s a gorgeous design, but not quite the right match for my shape, so I had to return it. Such a bummer because I really wanted it to work!
The fabric is a little thick, but it fits good and looks professional. It's a little big around the neck but still a keeper.
Really cute & a fan of the choker style. Great buy👍🏼🙌🏼
Super cute top and the material is nice and stretchy
Super cute!  I needed to go with a medium (usually wear a large) but it looked great.  Fabric is very nice and soft, not a shiny polyester feel...
This is keyhole, a nice fit medium for 36C 145-158ish 5 feet 7 person. If you are smaller on top might need to add a tuck, so that it doesnt gap.
Fantastic fall/winter top. Very professional and fun. I am 4'10", 105lbs, and the small fits perfect.
